    • Uses of Company in d.DAO

      Methods in d.DAO that return Company 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Company CompanyDbDAO.getCompany(long compId) 
      Company CompanyDAO.getCompany(long compId)
      this method returns from the DB 1 company details with the specified companyID, creates a new Company java bean, sets all of the parameters according to the DB information retrieved, and returns that Company object.
      Company CompanyDbDAO.getCompanyByName(java.lang.String name) 
      Company CompanyDAO.getCompanyByName(java.lang.String name)
      this method uses a company name as a received parameter and returns that company as an object from the DB, if exists.
      Methods in d.DAO that return types with arguments of type Company 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Collection<Company> CompanyDbDAO.getAllCompanies() 
      java.util.Collection<Company> CompanyDAO.getAllCompanies()
      this method gets all the companies from the DB, creates a java bean for each one and adds them to an ArrayList collection.

      java.util.Collection<Coupon> CompanyDAO.getCouponsByPrice(Company comp, double price)
      this method gets all the coupons of a specified company from the DB up to a specified price, creates a java bean for each one and adds them to an ArrayList collection.

      java.util.Collection<Coupon> CompanyDAO.getCouponsByType(Company comp, CouponType type)
      this method gets all the coupons of a specified type, of a specified company from the DB, creates a java bean for each one and adds them to an ArrayList collection.

      java.util.Collection<Coupon> CompanyDAO.getCouponsUpToDate(Company comp, java.sql.Date date)
      this method gets all the coupons of a specified company from the DB up to a specified date, creates a java bean for each one and adds them to an ArrayList collection.

    • Uses of Company in e.facade

      Methods in e.facade that return Company 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Company AdminFacade.getCompany(long id)
      this method is used to get an existing Company object from the DB, using its id.
      Company AdminFacade.getCompanyByName(java.lang.String name)
      this method is used to get an existing Company object from the DB, using its name.
      Company CompanyFacade.getCurrentCompany()
      this is a utility method used to retrieve a Copmany object from the DB with all of it's attributes, after a successful login and facade acquisition.
      Methods in e.facade that return types with arguments of type Company 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Collection<Company> AdminFacade.getAllCompanies()
      this method is used to get all existing companies, or an exception if no companies exist.
      Methods in e.facade with parameters of type Company 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void AdminFacade.createCompany(Company comp)
      this method receives a Company object, checks the DB to see if that name is available, and if so- creates this new Company on the DB.
      void AdminFacade.removeCompany(Company comp)
      this method receives a Company object, checks the DB to see if that company actually exists.
      void AdminFacade.updateCompany(Company newComp)
      this method receives a Company object, checks to ensure it's updateable attributes are valid, and then updates that company on the DB by retrieving the existing company, setting's its updatable attributes, and sending it to an update.
